item.title: Pulling a Tractor Out of Snow
item.description: Shows the challenging process of freeing a tractor stuck in snow, highlighting techniques, tools, and problem-solving in tough winter conditions.

item.title: This One Is on Us!
item.description: Sharing a generous moment or giveaway, highlighting the reason for the treat, gift, or surprise and the reactions it brings.

item.title: Rain Is Coming: Hammer Down!
item.description: Preparing for incoming rain while working, showing quick action, safety measures, and how to keep projects on track despite changing weather.

item.title: Brody…Get Heavier!
item.description: A fun or motivational moment encouraging Brody to gain weight or strength, showcasing progress, challenges, and determination in the process.

item.title: This Was a Great Idea!
item.description: Highlights a successful project or experiment, showing why it was a smart choice and the positive results or benefits that came from the idea.

item.title: A Perfect Day for Harvesting Corn
item.description: Shows ideal conditions for harvesting corn, highlighting machinery in action, efficient techniques, and the satisfaction of a productive day in the field.

item.title: House Building Behind Schedule but Progressing
item.description: Updates on a home construction project running behind schedule, showing ongoing progress, challenges, and steps being taken to keep the build moving forward.

item.title: This Could Be a Bad Deal
item.description: Exploring a situation that might turn into a bad deal, highlighting potential risks, red flags, and considerations before making a decision.

item.title: We Had to Remove the Entire Floor
item.description: Shows the tough job of removing an entire floor, detailing the process, challenges, and steps involved in a major renovation or repair project.

item.title: 44 Man Hours Later: Bin Site Clean-Up Nightmare
item.description: Shows the grueling process of cleaning a bin site, taking 44 man hours, highlighting the challenges, effort, and teamwork involved in farm maintenance.

item.title: It Was Going So Good! Blew the Main Hose
item.description: A frustrating moment on the farm when the main hose fails, showing the unexpected breakdown, reaction, and steps to fix the issue during fieldwork.

item.title: Installing New Tracks on the S790 Combine
item.description: Shows the challenging process of putting new tracks on an S790 combine, highlighting the effort, tools, and techniques needed for maintenance in the field.

item.title: It Came Detached from the Machine!
item.description: A surprising farming moment when a part comes detached from the machine, showing the challenges, quick thinking, and problem-solving on the farm.

item.title: When the Boss Says “Run It”… Big Mistake!
item.description: We are a family farm located in west central Minnesota. est. 1918 We enjoy to share our part in agricultural with you and show our followers the ups and downs of farming. I hope you enjoy our videos.

item.title: Combine Dies with Under 400 Hours
item.description: A farm combine fails in under 400 hours of use, highlighting equipment issues, maintenance lessons, and the challenges of managing heavy machinery.

item.title: Dougo Brings the Jokes
item.description: A lighthearted moment featuring Dougo’s humor, sharing laughs and showcasing the fun side of farm life through his jokes and playful personality.

item.title: Corn Harvest Underwater
item.description: A unique farm challenge harvesting corn in flooded conditions, showcasing problem-solving, equipment handling, and the resilience required in adverse weather.

item.title: It’s Been Traded
item.description: A farm vehicle gets traded, highlighting the process, decision-making, and excitement of upgrading or exchanging equipment in everyday farm life.

item.title: One Rock Away from Success
item.description: A farm task nearly completes with just one final rock, highlighting persistence, problem-solving, and the satisfying moments of finishing challenging work.

item.title: Laughing at Dougo’s Struggle
item.description: A lighthearted farm moment where Dougo faces a challenge, showing humor, camaraderie, and the relatable trials of everyday farm work.
